question.title: Will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

Q.title: Will Iran support a major attack on Israeli interests abroad before May 1, 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that Iran has provided significant support for an attack on Israeli interests outside of Israel, leading to substantial casualties.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran supports a major attack on Israeli interests abroad, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that Iran has provided significant support for an attack on Israeli interests outside of Israel, leading to substantial casualties. Additionally, this question resolves Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Iran does not support a major attack on Israeli interests abroad, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel?
P_given_not_Q.body:
Suppose the following is true: Iran will not support a major attack on Israeli interests abroad before May 1, 2024. This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

Resolution criteria for the condition: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that Iran has provided significant support for an attack on Israeli interests outside of Israel, leading to substantial casualties.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: This question resolves Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

Q.title: Will Iran support a proxy group to carry out an attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that Iran has provided support to a proxy group that has conducted an attack within Israel's borders, regardless of the attack's outcome.

P_given_Q.title: Given that Iran supports a proxy group to carry out an attack within Israel before May 1, 2024, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that Iran has provided support to a proxy group that has conducted an attack within Israel's borders, regardless of the attack's outcome. Additionally, this question resolves Yes if credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

P_given_not_Q.title: If Iran does not support a proxy group to carry out an attack within Israel before May 1, 2024, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. The condition is that there are no credible reports indicating that Iran has provided support to a proxy group that has conducted an attack within Israel's borders, regardless of the attack's outcome.

question.title: Is it expected that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

Q.title: Will Iran support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024?
Q.body: This question will be answered with a Yes if there are credible reports of Iran providing military support to a significant operation against Israel that results in notable military engagement or casualties before December 31, 2024.

P_given_Q.title: Given that Iran supports a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question will be answered with a Yes if there are credible reports of Iran providing military support to a significant operation against Israel that results in notable military engagement or casualties before December 31, 2024. Additionally, it will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Iran does not support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question will be answered with a Yes if there are no credible reports of Iran providing military support to a significant operation against Israel that results in notable military engagement or casualties before December 31, 2024. Furthermore, this question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people. 

Resolution criteria: 
- For P: There must be no credible reports of Iran providing military support to a significant operation against Israel resulting in notable military engagement or casualties before December 31, 2024. 
- For Q: There must be credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people before May 1, 2024.

Q.title: Will Iran support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024?
Q.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before December 31, 2024, there are credible reports of Iran providing direct military support to a group conducting operations against Israel that results in significant military engagement.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran supports a significant military operation against Israel, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people. The condition for this question is: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before December 31, 2024, there are credible reports of Iran providing direct military support to a group conducting operations against Israel that results in significant military engagement.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Iran will not support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people. However, this is under the condition that there are no credible reports of Iran providing direct military support to a group conducting operations against Israel that results in significant military engagement, as defined by the first question.
